attributes.title: THIS IS NOT THE REAL TRUMP APP
attributes.review: This is a fake app created by Dirty Dems to give you a virus. I thought I was supporting Daddy Donald John Trump😫by downloading this but when I opened it, my brand new phone immediately crashed and would not function properly. I took it to the store and luckily it was still under warranty but I don’t want this to happen to anyone else and for them to have to pay. Do not download!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely incredible app
attributes.review: I think the only thing better than this app is our commander and chief

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review:
First of all, i wanna day how incredibly long it took to download this app. It took about two weeks! Second, i really wanna y’all about how EXTREMELY SLOW the app is. There are also advertisements popping up like every two seconds i cant even take a look at the trump zaddy orange news😿. Next, i would love to pay my respects to the mr trump; TRUMP 2020🇺🇸in jail✨🤪💗🥰😍😹 
Thank you. 😝🤪😁😄😊😆🙈👍

attributes.title: ❌DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP❌
attributes.review: Ok so first of all this app took a week to download! I’m very disappointed. I love my president the so ever loving Donald Trump! When I found out he had an app I was so happy! When the app finally opened it was so plain! Like it looked horrible! I expected better! It was so not worth a download! So everyone don’t download this at all!💕🧚🏻‍♂️✨ I think our president needs to go bad to the Cheeto bag✨🧚🏻‍♂️💕

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN!!!!
attributes.review: This is RIDICULOUS wants MY PHONE NUMBER TO CALL ME I agreed because I really wanted the app!!! Thinking it would only be a few calls here and there but IT WAS EVERYDAY NONSTOP I COULD BARELY GET SLEEP AT NIGHT! My husband Richard was having a SEIZURE I COULDNT EVEN CALL 911 BECAUSE THEY KEPT CALLING!!!!!! Luckily we had a house phone! Everyday I would get texts saying make America Great again and get of your rump and vote for Trump!! Are you SERIOUS DONALD!!! Fix your app AND FIX AMERICA!!! -Karen

attributes.title: This is seriously a problem 🥱🤢
attributes.review: I am very disappointed that I downloaded this app to support my beautiful president Donald Duck I mean Donald J Trump I downloaded the app but my phone percent went down THEN up again it was beeping all night saying TRUMP 2020 I was saying no! Then I through my phone out the window and it flew back up at me I had to burn my phone after this thanks Donald trump. Trump 2020 ✨𝑜𝑛 𝑎 𝑔𝑟𝑎𝑣𝑒𝑠𝑡𝑜𝑛𝑒✨

attributes.title: VIRUS AND CRASHES EVERYWHERE
attributes.review: I am totally not righting this review for the sake of it being deleted, but I would rather like to complain about its bugs, it keeps notifying me to “get a free iPhone” when in fact it is obviously a virus, not only that it also crashes around every 15 seconds. I recommend downloading this for the totally not only reason to rate one star. Good day

attributes.title: Bad graphics
attributes.review:
Horrible graphics 1/10. I couldn’t even walk around in game without my phone having a stroke.
Another thing, the plot is extremely boring. No creativity or interesting events. Worse than fortnite and pubg.
The only part I liked was when the final boss, the police, barged into my house in the middle of the night and made me go to therapy.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.review: This app is the most terrifying app to exist. I download it get all set up and stuff you know. I get “hey baby, wanna come to the White House later? 😉” I didn’t ask for this type of thing and I am extremely uncomfortable with this app. Not only is the president the most tangerine looking person, he is flat out creepy. I STRONGLY recommend to delete this app as soon as possible.

I’m only leaving 1 star because it’s the lowest I can on here, this app was full of misinformation based on absolutely no science or actual facts, one might even say it’s fake news. And how do you have a Trump app with no 24h trump cam??? How are we supposed to know if he’s actually doing his presidential work??? Very disappointed. No coupon section either.
